title: Lena's Security, Day 2
description: What was Lena thinking, letting Tim and Dominick take advantage of her body the way they did last night? They told her they plan to swap places with her tonight, but she's so embarrassed by her own actions, she's willing to do anything to avoid seeing them again.  Offended that Lena is willing to risk her own life to avoid them, Tim and Dominick do more than swap places with each other their second day with Lena.  This erotic short story is an adults only read!
author: B.S.M. Stoneking
